title: Please id this font
content:
Please id the san-serif font used in this.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Larte3.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829000516/http:/typophile.com/files/Larte3.pdf) | 12.43 KB |
author: hyc26

comments.content:
It looks a lot like Dieter Steffmann's Marketing Script, but modified – especially on the A. The original is not closed; it’s open like this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829000516im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MS-Arte_4883.png)

Thanks but I want to know the san-serif font....  
Is it helvetica Neue?

Confirming both Helvetica Neue and a customized Marketing Script/ [Freehand 521](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829000516/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/freehand-521)/Mandate/Opti Sports for "L'Arte".
